section.name: Contact Me
section.p: To be part of cyclops group, just send me a email. Be sure to be a member of sourceforge.net, or you won't access the services provided by sourceforge.

section.name: MAVEN
section.p: All projects here is built by Apache Maven project. Building these projects with Maven is essential to the development process. Please check http://maven.apache.org to find out how to download and install Maven. Since we need additional jar resources other than what ibiblio.org provides, http://cyclops-group.sourceforge.net/maven-repo should be added to your maven.repo.remote entry in ${user.home}/build.properties.
section.source:
########maven remote repository######## maven.repo.remote=http://www.ibiblio.org/maven,http://cyclops-group.sourceforge.net/maven-repo maven.mode.online=true maven.username=g-cyclops
########additional resource directory######## maven.resource.dir=${user.home}/.maven/resources
########local appserver plugin settings######## maven.appserver.name=tomcat maven.appserver.version=4.0.x maven.appserver.home=D:/Java/apache/jakarta-tomcat-4.0.6 maven.appserver.conf.dir=${maven.resource.dir}/appserver/conf/${maven.appserver.fullname} maven.appserver.dir=${basedir}/target/server maven.war.webapp.dir=${maven.appserver.dir}/webapps/${pom.artifactId}
########local torque plugin settings########
torque.basePrefix=Base torque.addSaveMethod=true torque.saveException=Exception torque.initialID=1000 initialIDValue=1000 initialIDStep=10 torque.schema.om.includes=${torque.project}*-schema.xml
torque.doc.format=anakia torque.doc.dir=${maven.gen.docs}/database
torque.contextProperties=${user.home}/build.properties
########local test plugin settings######## maven.test.skip=true
section.p: Beside, the amulets contains several maven plugins which could be useful.

section.name: JAVA IDE
section.p: Developers can use any Java IDE to develop these project, but adding dependencies into classpath one by one is very difficult. Fortunately Maven provided plugins for some popular Java IDEs like eclipse, idea intellij and jbuilder. Check http://maven.apache.org/reference/developers/ide for how to use these plugins.
